page.title: 07AMENITIES and EDUCATION.
page.content: {Surgeries}are within four miles of Yarpole, with the very caring and efficient Drs. Ovenden and Snape. {Water}installation was begun in 1969 for all though some retain well water; {sewage}was connected from 1973/4, from near the top of Green Lane through the village to the pumping station at Lower House bend. The rest of the area use{septic tanks.}There are some pave- ments in the village centre and no street lights. 5 days a week a{service bus}travels to Leominster at 8.00 a.m. returning at 5.30 p.m.,with 2 shopping buses a week.The late Mrs E.Parr (also Patron of the living) gave 3 new{bus shelters to the Parish.
